Name: Disable-DAManualEntryPointSelection
Synopsis: Disables a manually selected DirectAccess site, and reverts the selection to the default.

Name: Enable-DAManualEntryPointSelection
Synopsis: Allows a user to manually choose which DirectAccess entry point to use for connectivity.

Name: Get-DAClientExperienceConfiguration
Synopsis: Returns the configuration for the DirectAccess client user experience.

Name: Get-DAEntryPointTableItem
Synopsis: Retrieves the list of entry points that have been configured for DirectAccess.

Name: New-DAEntryPointTableItem
Synopsis: Configures a new entry point for multisite DirectAccess.

Name: Remove-DAEntryPointTableItem
Synopsis: Removes a DirectAccess entry point from the specified configuration store.

Name: Reset-DAClientExperienceConfiguration
Synopsis: Restores the specified DirectAccess client configuration to the defaults.

Name: Reset-DAEntryPointTableItem
Synopsis: Resets the specified DirectAccess entry point configuration to the default configuration.

Name: Set-DAClientExperienceConfiguration
Synopsis: Modifies the configuration of the specified DirectAccess client user experience.

Name: Set-DAEntryPointTableItem
Synopsis: Modifies the configuration of a DirectAccess entry point stored in a Group Policy object.
